name: Unyarned
description:
A game where you play as a teleporting cat fighting a bunch of evil grandma-controlled sweaters!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement/Jumping
V - Warp
C - Dash
Left Shift - Throw
Right Shift - Scratch

CREDITS (These people are super cool and made this game possible <3) :

Eric Y - Programming
Jaden L - Music/Art
Leo L - Particles/SFX
Mady M - Art/Animation
